Action spectrum for the production fo previtamin-D3 in human skin,
CIE Techincal Report TC 6-54, Commission Internationale
del'Eclairage, 2006.
Values below 260 nm and beyond 315 nm were interpolated by CIE using
a spline fit.
Wavelength, nm
